body:
Day 47 - 1126*
At first, my only real complain was that the shots that were made to put the genitals in the highlight were destroyed by the awful censorship that covered half of such panels. However, by the middle, a ton of girls appeared out of thin air and they became the focus, the real problem is that there were two pages for each, no more than that. How can I appreciate someone if they only appear in two pages? I can't.
1/10.
